settings.confirm_close_no_save:
The settings have been changed but not saved.
Do you want to close without saving?

mapedit.error_mapid_character: Only alphanumeric characters, under-bar & hyphen can be used for Map ID.
mapedit.confirm_change_mapid: Are you sure you want to change the Map ID?
mapedit.map_name_repr_desc: Enter map name for representation within 30 half-width (15 full-width) characters.
mapedit.map_author_pf: Enter author name of the map.
mapedit.map_author_desc: Enter author name of the map.
mapedit.map_create_at_pf: Enter the time at when the map is created.
mapedit.map_create_at_desc: Enter the time at when the map is created. Any representation is acceptable.
mapedit.map_era_pf: Enter the era for the map subject.
mapedit.map_era_desc: Enter the era for the map subject. If not entered, it is replaced by "Created At".
mapedit.map_owner_desc: Enter owner or donor of the map.
mapedit.map_mapper_pf: Enter the person who did mapping GCPs od the map.
mapedit.map_mapper_desc: Enter the person who did mapping GCPs od the map.
mapedit.map_image_license_desc: Enter the license of map image.
mapedit.map_gcp_license_desc: Enter the license of mapping data.
mapedit.map_copyright_pf: Enter the copyright description of map image.
mapedit.map_copyright_desc: Enter the copyright description of map image.
mapedit.map_gcp_copyright_pf: Enter the copyright description of mapping data.
mapedit.map_gcp_copyright_desc: Enter the copyright description of mapping data.
mapedit.map_tile_pf: Enter the URL of map image tile.
mapedit.map_tile_desc: If you use an external map tile, enter the format http://...{z}/{x}/{y}.{png|jpg}. No setting is required when using the standard placement position.
mapedit.map_description_pf: Enter the description of the map.
mapedit.map_description_desc: Enter the description of the map.
mapedit.map_error_linear: GCPs are too linear. Scatter them more.
mapedit.map_error_outside: Some GCPs are outside the map area. Place them in the map area.
mapedit.map_error_crossing: Error in corresponding lines (They intersect, etc.). Please correct it.
mapedit.map_loose_by_error: In loose mode, because errors have occurred.
mapedit.context_correspond_line_start: Corresponding Line Start From This Marker
mapedit.context_correspond_line_end: Corresponding Line End To This Marker
mapedit.alert_mapid_checked: This is unique map ID. Confirmed.
mapedit.alert_mapid_duplicated: Map ID is duplicated. Change to another ID.
mapedit.confirm_override_image:
Map image was already submitted.
Are you sure you want to replace it?
mapedit.error_image_upload: Error occurs while registering map image.
mapedit.message_download: Now preparing map data for exporting...
mapedit.confirm_save:
Save your changes. 
Are you sure?
mapedit.copy_or_move:
Map ID has been changed. Do you want to make a copy?
Select OK to copy, Cancel to move.
mapedit.confirm_layer_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this sublayer?
mapedit.confirm_no_save:
The map data has been changed but not saved.
Are you sure you want to close without saving?
mapedit.testerror_too_short: Too few GCPs for projection test.
mapedit.testerror_too_linear: The projection test cannot be performed because GCPs are too linear.
mapedit.testerror_outside: The projection test cannot be performed because some GCPs are outside the map area.
mapedit.testerror_line: The projection test cannot be performed because there are some errors in corresponding lines.
mapedit.testerror_unknown: The projection test cannot be performed because of unknown error.
mapedit.testerror_valid_error: If there are any errors in strict mode, the inverse projection test is not possible.
mapedit.testerror_outside_map: Cannot perform projection test because it is outside the map area.

mapmodel.over_title: Enter {{lang}} title for representation within 30 half-width characters (or 15 full-width characters).
mapmodel.image_copyright: Enter representation of map image's copyright.
